message: Starting verification - checking if project context was received in prompt

Found the prompt injection code at lines 1117-1118 and 1136. context_prompt IS being generated and injected. But NO context is in my prompt. Investigating client_cwd value to see if the directory detection is working correctly.

VERIFICATION COMPLETE. RESULTS: NO project context received in my prompt - fix did NOT work. ROOT CAUSE: The orchestrator (or Claude Code MCP client) does NOT pass client_cwd when calling create_real_task(). The server-side fix is correct but incomplete - the CLIENT must be updated to pass client_cwd=os.getcwd() to create_real_task(). Without this, the registry stores null, and the fallback logic fails to find the project directory. The feature is BROKEN END-TO-END until the MCP client integration is fixed. Files that need fixing: Whatever code calls mcp__claude-orchestrator__create_real_task - must add client_cwd parameter.
